tls:text.tls:line: Yellow Emperor, who lived in ancient times,
as an baby he was able to speak,

sense.def: be an infant; be young, be of an age where one is still very much dependent on others; be too young

tls:text.tls:line: and in his early youth he showed superior intelligence;

sense.def: be endowed with superior comprehensive intellectual facultaties and talent

tls:text.tls:line: as he grew up he was reliable and adroit,
and as an adult (or: when fully accomplished as an adult) he ascended to heaven.
and as an adult (or: when fully accomplished as an adult) he ascended to heaven.

sense.def: climb up, go up; also by flying: 豋天 "rise to Heaven".

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: Then (there in Heaven) he asked the Master of Heaven:

sense.def: and thereupon, and then accordingly; then without delay;Then accordingly (often after a direct speech)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: Then (there in Heaven) he asked the Master of Heaven:

sense.def: 問於N曰 ZHUANG 問乎N曰

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: Then (there in Heaven) he asked the Master of Heaven:

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: "I have learnt

sense.def: I (particularly from Warring States onwards: "I personally" rarely physically: "I purely physically (was injured etc) )

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: that the men of highest antiquity

sense.def: high 上古 "high antiquity" 上世 [note the connotation of elevated significance of high antiquity]

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: that the men of highest antiquity

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: as for their age, all lived for a full one hundred years,

sense.def: years of age (and of activity) 富春秋 "still young"

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: as for their age, all lived for a full one hundred years,

sense.def: pass through (some number of years etc)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: and in their activities they did not decline.

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: and in their activities they did not decline.

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: Now the fact that men of the present age

sense.def: present time> at present time; now

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: Now the fact that men of the present age

sense.def: OBI: present, contemporary; in the present sequence of days/months

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: even at an age of half of a hundred

sense.def: the contextually determinate N's age; the number of years one lives, the time-span one has lived or will live 盡其天年

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: will all decline in their activities,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: is that because the times are different

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: is that because the times are different

sense.def: of the time, of the period; contemporary

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: is that because the times are different

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 14

tls:text.tls:line: is that because the times are different

sense.def: stand out; be different from the ordinary, extraordinary, exceptional, phenomenal

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Etaient des observants de la Voie;

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Ils se rglaient sur le yin/yang

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Et atteignaient l'Harmonie par les Pratiques et les Nombres.

sense.def: be in continuous harmony through or with

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Et atteignaient l'Harmonie par les Pratiques et les Nombres.

sense.def: advanced practical methods (of any kind); systematic technique; methodology(!)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Ils buvaient et mangeaient avec mesure,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Ils buvaient et mangeaient avec mesure,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Ils travaillaient et se reposaient avec rgularit,

sense.def: activity and inactivity> deportment, behaviour, comportment; one's well-being

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Ils travaillaient et se reposaient avec rgularit,

sense.def: constant norm; highest norm; routine; constancy in attitude

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Ils ne s'extnuaient pas en activits inconsidres.

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Ils ne s'extnuaient pas en activits inconsidres.

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Pouvant ainsi maintenir l'union du corps et des Esprits,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Pouvant ainsi maintenir l'union du corps et des Esprits,

sense.def: spirit soul; the spirits (as distinct from the mind 心 and opposed to the body 形)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Pouvant ainsi maintenir l'union du corps et des Esprits,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Et, centenaires, s'en allaient.

sense.def: pass through (some number of years etc)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 1; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 17

tls:text.tls:line: Et, centenaires, s'en allaient.

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Pour les hommes d'aujourd'hui, rien de tel !

sense.def: present time> at present time; now

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: De l'alcool, ils font leur potage,

sense.def: congee, xīfàn 稀飯; water in which rice has been boiled

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: De l'inconduite, leur ordinaire;

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: De l'inconduite, leur ordinaire;

sense.def: constant norm; highest norm; routine; constancy in attitude

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ils entrent, en pleine ivresse, dans la chambre  coucher,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ils entrent, en pleine ivresse, dans la chambre  coucher,

sense.def: retire to bedchambe (to have in sex)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ils laissent les passions asscher leurs essences

sense.def: cause to be dry > exhaust the resources of; use up

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ils laissent les passions asscher leurs essences

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Et la dissipation dilapider leur Authentique;

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Et la dissipation dilapider leur Authentique;

sense.def: inner integrity; what is genuine in one; genuine inner nature; genuine essence; one's true being

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Incapables de maintenir leur plnitude

sense.def: be intellectually capable to V; understand how to, know how to V; have the good sense to; know the importance of Ving

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Incapables de maintenir leur plnitude

sense.def: maintain and support; continue to have; maintain the existence of; hold on to, keep;

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Incapables de maintenir leur plnitude

sense.def: a strong inner "plenitude", a state of being pervaded by vital essences

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ils conduisent leurs Esprits  contre-temps,

sense.def: in an untimely fashion, at the wrong time; not in proper season

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ils conduisent leurs Esprits  contre-temps,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ils conduisent leurs Esprits  contre-temps,

sense.def: spirit soul; the spirits (as distinct from the mind 心 and opposed to the body 形)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Par l'affairement ils excitent leur coeur,

sense.def: aim to, aspire to; make it one's business, be preoccupied with the task of

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Par l'affairement ils excitent leur coeur,

sense.def: satisfy the wishes of; give temporary delight to, give excitement to; give transitory elation to

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Sans modration, ils s'activent ou se reposent,

sense.def: activity and inactivity> deportment, behaviour, comportment; one's well-being

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Sans modration, ils s'activent ou se reposent,

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.1.4; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 2; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 19

tls:text.tls:line: Ainsi,  mi-chemin des cent ans, ils dclinent.

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.2.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 5; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 20

sense.def: subordinates; those who are of lower rank; inferiors

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.2.2; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 5; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 21

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.2.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 5; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 22

sense.def: cause to become confused; cause to be confused

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.2.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 5; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 22

sense.def: start to be afraid of; Danish: lade sige skraemme af

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.2.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 5; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 22

sense.def: come to conform to, conform to; be in accordance with; be in conformity with

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.2.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 5; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 22

sense.def: the contextually determinate N's age; the number of years one lives, the time-span one has lived or will live 盡其天年

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.2.3; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 5; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 22

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

sense.def: go on to say (i.e. ask); say (in the form of a question) in the process of a conversation

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

sense.def: marker of second of two alternative judgmental questions

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

sense.def: (normally human or equine etc) front teeth, tooth

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

sense.def: get to change, change one's orientation

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.1; ed. Renminweisheng 1982, p. 7; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 23

tls:text.tls:line: and hair starts to grow steadily.

sense.def: hair; human hair on the head

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.2; ed. Renminweisheng 19i2, p. 7f; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 25

tls:text.tls:line: At the age of twice seven the stage of puberty arrives

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.2; ed. Renminweisheng 19i2, p. 7f; ; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 25

tls:text.tls:line: hormone passages is opened up

tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.3; ed. Renminweisheng 19i2, p. 8; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: The face begins to dries up

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.3; ed. Renminweisheng 19i2, p. 8; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 26

tls:text.tls:line: The face begins to dries up

tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.6; ed. Renminweisheng 19i2, p. 8; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 30

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.6; ed. Renminweisheng 19i2, p. 8; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 30

sense.def: fall; fall off (a horse); fall out (of teeth)

tls:line.title: 黃帝內經(en)
tls:line.loc: SUWEN 1.3.6; ed. Renminweisheng 19i2, p. 8; tr. Rochat/Larre 1993, p. 30
